headline: BD to Present at Bank of America Securities Health Care Conference
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced that it will present at the Bank of America Securities Health Care Conference on Tuesday, May 13, 2025 at 1:00 pm Eastern Time.

headline: MedTech Stocks' Earnings to Watch on May 1: BDX, CAH, BAX, DXCM & SYK
summary: The medical device industry is growing fast in 2025, but faces supply and trade issues. Major companies to report earnings on May 1, stay tuned!
